snippet: The rookie’s suspension will begin with Game 3 of the series Monday in Ottawa.
abstract: National Hockey League suspends New York Rangers winger Carl Hagelin for three games for elbowing Ottawa Senators winger Daniel Alfredsson in head during Senators 3-2 overtime playoff victory in playoffs; the suspension will begin with Game 3 of the 1-1 series.

byline.contributor: Jeff Z. Klein contributed reporting from Greenburgh, N.Y.

lead_paragraph: The rookie’s suspension will begin with Game 3 of the series Monday in Ottawa.

headline.seo: N.H.L. Suspends Rangers’ Hagelin Three Games for Elbowing Alfredsson
headline.main: N.H.L. Suspends Rangers’ Hagelin Three Games for Elbowing Alfredsson
headline.print_headline: N.H.L. Suspends Rangers’ Hagelin Three Games for Elbowing Alfredsson
